text: Scripps Networks interactive is the
leading lifestyle producing media
company in the world they are composed
of brands such as HGTV Food Network
Travel Channel before moving to the
cloud our IT environment was composed of
two data centers we had one on-premise
at our office and one that was
approximately five miles away
we were really involved with trying to
support seasonal loads we run cyclicals
through the year with our food brands we
were really big around you know
Thanksgiving to December and January
time frame during those time frames were
purchasing twice as much hardware as we
needed and we were having to keep that
on-premise and in a separate data center
in order to accommodate our needs we
weren't able to scale and expand our
infrastructure as we needed so moving
into the cloud changed how we approached
everything it made us stop and rethink
our whole approach to architecture
around our applications all the sudden
we weren't having to design a bunch of
hardware upfront to manage our
applications we were able to actually
leverage a lot of the AWS services to
help us do that scaling for us and
actually bring up the load when we
needed and bring it back down when we
detonate it and it gave us the
capability to only pay for it when we
were using it where can the cloud has
changed our business completely
especially for the designer motion team
the designer motion team came to us with
an emergency they needed to make a
delivery on their dream home sweepstakes
within 48 hours they had tried this with
their own premise hardware they had
failed they wanted to run this with our
clouds render farm we successively
submitted that job and turned around a
production quality render to our
broadcast operations within two hours
which was considered a complete success
at that point they came to us and said
we want to move all of our operations
into the cloud render farm AWS and
Thinkbox worked with us hand-in-hand to
help us develop the final production
solution they were instrumental in
helping us develop and instrument their
plugin so that we could
the designer motion teams into the AWS
cloud environment working with AWS has
allowed us to focus more on bringing our
business customers products to market
faster AWS has allowed us to focus on
the solutions we need to focus on while
they provide us with the back-end
infrastructure services that we need in
a partner
you
